## Slots

| Slot          | Description     |
| ------------- | --------------- |
| `"(default)"` | The input label |


## Shadow Parts

| Part        | Description                        |
| ----------- | ---------------------------------- |
| `"body"`    | The container of the suffix slot   |
| `"footer"`  |                                    |
| `"header"`  | The asterisk when required is true |
| `"tab-bar"` | The container of the prefix slot   |
| `"toolbar"` | The container of the suffix slot   |
